## Projection.localTangentSpace() method

Gets the \[\[TransformLike\]\] of the local tangent space at the given point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
localTangentSpace(point: GeoCoordinatesLike | Vector3Like, result: TransformLike): TransformLike;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point | [GeoCoordinatesLike](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinateslike.md) \| [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The geo / world coordinates. |
|  result | [TransformLike](./harp-geoutils.transformlike.md) | The \[\[TransformLike\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TransformLike](./harp-geoutils.transformlike.md)
